text: The University of North Carolina Wilmington is a public, coeducational university in Wilmington, North Carolina. The university has about 16,000 students. It was founded in 1947. The current chancellor of the university is Aswani K. Volety. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Seahawks. They have 19 varsity teams and they compete in the Coastal Athletic Association. == Notable people == Faculty include Herbert Berg, philosophy and religion. ==Other websites== *University of North Carolina Wilmington's Official website *UNCW Seahawks' Official athletics website Unc Wilmington Category:Colleges and universities in North Carolina Category:1947 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in North Carolina
title: University of North Carolina Wilmington
